    • Constructor Detail

      • JarFileComponentManager

        public JarFileComponentManager(java.lang.Class<? extends Interface> superClass)
        Maintains a list of plugin directories which will be scanned for JAR files. For any JAR file found in the available search directories each will be scanned and all valid classes loaded. Any existing objects of this type will be updated.
        Parameters:
        superClass - An ancestor of any plugins that should be loaded

    • Method Detail

      • addModuleDirectory

        public boolean addModuleDirectory(java.lang.String path)
        Adds a new directory to the list of searchable directories.
        Specified by:
        addModuleDirectory in interface ComponentManager<Interface>
        Parameters:
        path - The path to be added
        Returns:
        true iff the path passed refers to a valid directory

      • refreshModules

        public void refreshModules()
        Refreshes the available plugin directories, loading new versions of classes and updating existing references as required. Does not scan subdirectories.
        Specified by:
        refreshModules in interface ComponentManager<Interface>

      • getAvailableModules

        public java.util.List<ComponentManager.ModuleSummary> getAvailableModules()
        Provides a list of all available modules
        Specified by:
        getAvailableModules in interface ComponentManager<Interface>
        Returns:
        A List of ComponentManager.ModuleSummarys which have been loaded

      • createObjectOfModule

        public int createObjectOfModule(int moduleID)
        Given a module ID, as returned by getAvailableModules(), instantiate a new object and return its ID
        Specified by:
        createObjectOfModule in interface ComponentManager<Interface>
        Parameters:
        moduleID - The ID relating to the class of the object to be created
        Returns:
        The ID of the newly created object, or -1 if an object could not be created
